Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Hedgehog = script.Parent
local Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator")
local Fire = script:WaitForChild("Fire")
Fire.Parent = Hedgehog Fire.Enabled = true
local Properties = { HedgehogAOE = 75, HedgehogSpeed = 120, BounceCount = 0, }
local RNG = Random.new()
local RandomSound = script:WaitForChild("Sounds"):GetChildren()
if #RandomSound > 0 then RandomSound = RandomSound[RNG:NextInteger(1,#RandomSound)] end
if RandomSound and RandomSound:IsA("Sound") then RandomSound.Parent = Hedgehog RandomSound:Play() end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local function GetNearestTorso(MarkedPosition,TorsoPopulationTable) local ClosestDistance = math.huge local ClosestTorso for i=1,#TorsoPopulationTable do local distance = (TorsoPopulationTable[i].CFrame.p-MarkedPosition).Magnitude if TorsoPopulationTable[i] and distance < ClosestDistance then ClosestDistance = distance ClosestTorso = TorsoPopulationTable[i] end end --warn("The Closest Person is: "..ClosestTorso.Parent.Name) return ClosestTorso end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end local RingList = {} function onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, position, explosionpressure) if not part or not part.Parent or part == Hedgehog or part.Parent:IsA("Accoutrement") or part:IsDescendantOf(Creator.Value.Character) or IsInTable(RingList,part) then return end local humanoid = part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if humanoid then local Character = humanoid.Parent if Character and Character ~= Creator.Value.Character and not Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") and not IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Creator.Value) for _,joints in pairs(part:GetJoints()) do joints:Destroy() end part.Velocity = (part.CFrame.p-position).unit*(explosionpressure/1000) end else --part:BreakJoints() for _,joints in pairs(part:GetJoints()) do joints:Destroy() end if not part.Anchored then part.Velocity = (part.CFrame.p-position).unit*(explosionpressure/100) end end end
Services.Debris:AddItem(Hedgehog,10)
local Exploded = false local ExplodedHum = {} Hedgehog.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end Properties.BounceCount = Properties.BounceCount + 1
if Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity") then Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity").Velocity = (Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity").Velocity).Unit*(Properties.HedgehogSpeed + (Properties.BounceCount*4)) end
local Hum,FF,Torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or FF or not Torso then return end
if IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) or Creator.Value == Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) then return end
UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Creator.Value) if Properties.BounceCount > 5 and not Exploded and not IsInTable(ExplodedHum,Hum) then --Exploded = true ExplodedHum[#ExplodedHum+1] = Hum local e = Create("Explosion"){ BlastRadius = 5, BlastPressure = 0, DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0, ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters, Position = Hedgehog.Position, Parent = workspace, } e.Hit:Connect(function(part,distance) onPlayerBlownUp(part,distance,e.Position,600000) end) else Hum:TakeDamage(25) end if Hum.Health <= 0 then local Ring = Create("Part"){ Locked = true, Anchored = false, Name = "Ring", CanCollide = true, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Transparency = 0, Size = Vector3.new(1.7,1.7,.3) } Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshId = "rbxassetid://3270017", TextureId = "rbxassetid://3270066", Scale = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*1.5, VertexColor = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*2, Parent = Ring } for i=1,RNG:NextInteger(7,20),1 do local RingClone = Ring:Clone() RingList[#RingList+1] = RingClone RingClone.CFrame = Torso.CFrame RingClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(RNG:NextNumber(5,25),RNG:NextNumber(5,25),RNG:NextNumber(5,25)) RingClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(RNG:NextNumber(20,40),RNG:NextNumber(20,40),RNG:NextNumber(20,40)) RingClone.Parent = workspace RingClone:SetNetworkOwner(nil) Services.Debris:AddItem(RingClone,7) end --print("Dead") end
end)
Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Connect(function() local Neg,Pos = Hedgehog.Position - Vector3.new(1,1,1)* Properties.HedgehogAOE, Hedgehog.Position + Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.HedgehogAOE local AOE = Region3.new(Neg,Pos) local Parts = workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(AOE,{Creator.Value.Character},math.huge) local PlayerTorsos,NPCTorsos = {},{} for i=1,#Parts,1 do if Parts[i] and Parts[i].Parent and (Parts[i].Position-Hedgehog.Position).Magnitude <= Properties.HedgehogAOE then local Hum, FF, Torso = Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"), Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField"),(Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) if Hum and Hum.Health ~= 0 and not FF and Torso and not IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) then PlayerTorsos[#PlayerTorsos+1] = Torso else NPCTorsos[#NPCTorsos+1] = Torso end end end end
local TargetTorso = GetNearestTorso(Hedgehog.Position,(#PlayerTorsos > 0 and PlayerTorsos) or (#NPCTorsos > 0 and NPCTorsos) or {})
if TargetTorso then if Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity") then Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity").Velocity = (TargetTorso.Position-Hedgehog.Position).Unit*(Properties.HedgehogSpeed + (Properties.BounceCount*4)) end end
end)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Hedgehog = script.Parent
local Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator")
local Fire = script:WaitForChild("Fire")
Fire.Parent = Hedgehog Fire.Enabled = true
local Properties = { HedgehogAOE = 30, HedgehogSpeed = 40, BounceCount = 0, }
local RNG = Random.new()
local RandomSound = script:WaitForChild("Sounds"):GetChildren()
if #RandomSound > 0 then RandomSound = RandomSound[RNG:NextInteger(1,#RandomSound)] end
if RandomSound and RandomSound:IsA("Sound") then RandomSound.Parent = Hedgehog RandomSound:Play() end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local function GetNearestTorso(MarkedPosition,TorsoPopulationTable) local ClosestDistance = math.huge local ClosestTorso for i=1,#TorsoPopulationTable do local distance = (TorsoPopulationTable[i].CFrame.p-MarkedPosition).Magnitude if TorsoPopulationTable[i] and distance < ClosestDistance then ClosestDistance = distance ClosestTorso = TorsoPopulationTable[i] end end --warn("The Closest Person is: "..ClosestTorso.Parent.Name) return ClosestTorso end
function onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, position, explosionpressure) if not part or not part.Parent or part.Parent:IsA("Accoutrement") or part:IsDescendantOf(Creator.Value.Character) then return end local humanoid = part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if humanoid then local Character = humanoid.Parent if Character and Character ~= Creator.Value.Character and not Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") and not IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Creator.Value) for _,joints in pairs(part:GetJoints()) do joints:Destroy() end part.Velocity = (part.CFrame.p-position).unit*(explosionpressure/1000) end else --part:BreakJoints() for _,joints in pairs(part:GetJoints()) do joints:Destroy() end if not part.Anchored then part.Velocity = (part.CFrame.p-position).unit*(explosionpressure/100) end end end
Services.Debris:AddItem(Hedgehog,10) local Exploded = false local Touch,Run Touch = Hedgehog.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end Properties.BounceCount = Properties.BounceCount + 1
if Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity") then Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity").Velocity = (Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity").Velocity).Unit*(Properties.HedgehogSpeed + (Properties.BounceCount*4)) end
local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or FF then return end
if IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) or Creator.Value == Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) then return end
UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Creator.Value) if Properties.BounceCount > 5 and not Exploded then Exploded = true Hedgehog.Anchored = true Hedgehog.Transparency = 1 Fire.Enabled = false if Touch then Touch:Disconnect(); Touch = nil end if Run then Run:Disconnect(); Run = nil end
local e = Create("Explosion"){ BlastRadius = 5, BlastPressure = 0, DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0, ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters, Position = Hedgehog.Position, Parent = workspace, } e.Hit:Connect(function(part,distance) onPlayerBlownUp(part,distance,e.Position,600000) end) else Hum:TakeDamage(25) end
end)
Run = Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Connect(function() local Neg,Pos = Hedgehog.Position - Vector3.new(1,1,1)* Properties.HedgehogAOE, Hedgehog.Position + Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.HedgehogAOE local AOE = Region3.new(Neg,Pos) local Parts = workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(AOE,{Creator.Value.Character},math.huge) local PlayerTorsos,NPCTorsos = {},{} for i=1,#Parts,1 do if Parts[i] and Parts[i].Parent and (Parts[i].Position-Hedgehog.Position).Magnitude <= Properties.HedgehogAOE then local Hum, FF, Torso = Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"), Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField"),(Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) if Hum and Hum.Health ~= 0 and not FF and Torso and not IsTeamMate(Creator.Value,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) then PlayerTorsos[#PlayerTorsos+1] = Torso else NPCTorsos[#NPCTorsos+1] = Torso end end end end
local TargetTorso = GetNearestTorso(Hedgehog.Position,(#PlayerTorsos > 0 and PlayerTorsos) or (#NPCTorsos > 0 and NPCTorsos) or {})
if TargetTorso then if Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity") then Hedgehog:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyVelocity").Velocity = (TargetTorso.Position-Hedgehog.Position).Unit*(Properties.HedgehogSpeed + (Properties.BounceCount*4)) end end
end)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)

local Tool = script.Parent
local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MouseInput",10)
function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end
